build.buildCommand: mkdir -p bootstrap/cache storage/framework/{sessions,views,cache} storage/logs && chmod -R 775 bootstrap/cache storage && composer install --no-dev --optimize-autoloader && php artisan config:cache && php artisan route:cache && php artisan view:cache

deploy.startCommand: php artisan migrate --force && php artisan db:seed --force --class=DatabaseSeeder && php artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
